input_text:
Job Title: Commercial Insurance CSR/Account Manager

Location: Woburn, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
About the job
Job Title: Commercial Lines Account Manager
Platform: New England Platform
Location: Woburn, MA
About Acrisure:
Acrisure is a global Fintech leader that combines the best of humans and high tech to offer multiple financial products and services to millions of businesses and individual clients. We connect clients to solutions that help them protect and grow what matters, including Insurance, Reinsurance, Cyber Services, Mortgage Origination and more.
Acrisure employs over 17,000 entrepreneurial colleagues in 21 countries and have grown from $38 million to $4.3 billion in revenue in just over ten years. Our culture is defined by our entrepreneurial spirit and all that comes with it: innovation, client centricity and an indomitable will to win.
Job Summary:
The New England Platform is currently looking to enhance our team with the addition of a Commercial Insurance Account Manager for our Woburn, MA office. Our Agency specializes in providing insurance and bonding for contractors. This position is in our Commercial Insurance Department and will be responsible for servicing middle market and small business commercial insurance accounts with a focus on construction. Our position is currently hybrid with 2 days per week working from home and three days in our Woburn, MA office. We have been located in Woburn since 1974.
Responsibilities include: 
Develop and maintain client relationships, and work with producers to ensure that all coverage and service needs are met. Review and analyze commercial accounts, make appropriate coverage and limits recommendations to producers and clients, as needed. Assemble information and applications provided by producers to prepare new business submissions. Assemble policy, coverage, and exposure information in conjunction with producers to prepare account submissions, and market to carriers. Prepare client proposals based on new and renewal quotations providing the best value to meet client’s coverage needs. Review, verify accuracy, and prepare invoices for incoming policies and endorsements of assigned accounts. Day to day processing of Workers’ Compensation and Commercial Auto policies, endorsements, and invoices, as well as Certificates of Insurance, will be handled primarily by Commercial Department support specialists. Cancellations, reinstatements, and the necessary follow-up are handled by a support specialist. Claims processing is also handled by a support specialist. Maintain the accuracy of data in the Agency Management System and its integrated Document Management System. Review contract insurance specifications for insureds to assure compliance, amend coverage and limits as needed, and provide updated Certificates of Insurance to reflect any required changes. Contribute to meeting agency production goals by assisting producers and providing superior customer service. (There are no new business or existing account rounding production requirements.) No premium collection responsibility as that is handled by the producer for each account. Conduct business knowledgeably and professionally demonstrating an understanding of the insurance business and the impact of your decisions on the client and the agency. Keep informed of changes and trends within the industry to anticipate and respond to clients’ needs. Other responsibilities as assigned by Management. 
This description is not meant to be all-inclusive and may be modified from time to time at the discretion of management. 
Qualifications: 
 Minimum 3+ years experience in commercial insurance.
Acrisure is committed to employing a diverse workforce. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, or disability status. California residents can learn more about our privacy practices for applicants by visiting the Acrisure California Applicant Privacy Policy available at www.Acrisure.com/privacy/caapplicant.
Apply here: https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/3860846137
To Executive Search Firms & Staffing Agencies: Acrisure does not accept unsolicited resumes from any agencies that have not signed a mutual service agreement. All unsolicited resumes will be considered Acrisure’s property, and Acrisure will not be obligated to pay a referral fee. This includes resumes submitted directly to Hiring Managers without contacting Acrisure’s Human Resources Talent Department.

Experience Level (if available): None
